fr.escape.resources

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.resources.Resources

  • public final class Resources
extends java.lang.Object

    Create a Index of available Resource and load them in memory if needed.

    You cannot unload them after that.

    For loading: simply use get...(...)

    Note: After instantiate this Object; You HAVE TO call load()
